Thousands of Kiwis who suffer from COPD to benefit from newly funded medicine https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/thousands-of-kiwis-who-suffer-from-copd-to-benefit-from-newly-funded-medicine/A5HECKXROZCDRKC566AV72NNR4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/thousands-of-kiwis-who-suffer-from-copd-to-benefit-from-newly-funded-medicine/A5HECKXROZCDRKC566AV72NNR4/ Around 15,000 New Zealanders currently suffer from chronic obstructive pulmonary disease. Wed, 11 Sep 2024 05:30:51 +0000 COPD is a long-term lung condition that can cause breathlessness, coughing, overproduction of mucus (sputum or phlegm) and sometimes wheezing.
